resources.string:
arXiv droid is a free and open-source Android application to browse daily scientific articles submitted to arXiv.org and to search the entire arXiv.org database.

Viewing PDFs requires a PDF viewer (try AdobeReader from the Market)

Add categories to your favorites list by long pressing on them. Share articles by pressing menu on the article screen.
Android 2.x required to download PDF in app
Added custom search to your favorites
Neither /sdcard or /emmc available to download PDF.
You must install a PDF Reader from the Market. Try AdobeReader.
Couldn\'t Parse - No Network Connection to Server?
